abstract.p: Westchester County legislator Thomas Abinanti discounts charges from political opponent Steve Ploski that he knowingly used county-financed e-mail address for his State Senate campaign (S)

block.p: ''Much ado about nothing'' is the way County Legislator Thomas J. Abinanti is responding to charges from a political opponent that Mr. Abinanti knowingly used a county-financed e-mail address for his State Senate campaign. Mr. Abinanti has removed the government e-mail listing, which he said was mistakenly included by an unknowing Webmaster, and replaced it with his personal e-mail address. He called it a human error and an example of ''the perils of modern technology.'' Steve Ploski, a Yonkers Democrat who plans to challenge Mr. Abinanti in a primary for the State Senate seat, filed a complaint with the Westchester County District Attorney's office, calling for an investigation of Mr. Abinanti's use of the Legislature e-mail address.
